```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
crime <- read.csv("Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
```

```{r}
crime %>% group_by(Offence.Subdivision) %>% 
  filter(Year >= 2010) %>% 
  filter(Offence.Division == "A Crimes against the person") %>% 
  arrange(Year) %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(y = Rate.per.100.000.population, x = Year))
```
